item.title: [HIVE-8443] Disable tez_smb_1 for mapreduce and prevent from test hang
item.summary: Disable tez_smb_1 for mapreduce and prevent from test hang

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
